Update requires: Replacement

LogGroupName.description: Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for egress logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the default name is used: /aws/MediaPackage/VodEgressAccessLogs.
LogGroupName.markdownDescription:
Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for egress logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the default name is used: /aws/MediaPackage/VodEgressAccessLogs.

Required: No  
Type: String

Maximum Length: 512
